ESP8266_IoT.connectThingSpeak|block: 上传数据到 ThingSpeak 平台|URL/IP = %ip|Write API key = %write_api_key|Field 1 = %n1|Field 2 = %n2|Field 3 = %n3|Field 4 = %n4|Field 5 = %n5|Field 6 = %n6|Field 7 = %n7|Field 8 = %n8
ESP8266_IoT.connectWifi|block: 初始化ESP8266IoT模块|RX (micro:bit 的 Tx) %tx|TX (micro:bit 的 Rx) %rx|模块波特率 %baudrate|Wifi 名称 = %ssid|Wifi 密码 = %pw
